scripts.dev: concurrently "cd front && yarn dev" "cd back && yarn dev"
scripts.lint:check: concurrently "cd front && yarn lint:check"  "cd back && yarn lint:check"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd front && yarn lint:fix" "cd back && yarn lint:fix"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd front && yarn test" "cd back && yarn test"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd front && yarn test:watch" "cd back && yarn test:watch"
scripts.test:cov: concurrently "cd front && yarn test:cov" "cd back && yarn test:cov"
scripts.test:cov:watch: concurrently "cd front && yarn test:cov:watch" "cd back && yarn test:cov:watch"
